extract_content.description: Extract clean, structured content from web pages with optional AI-powered summarization.

props.name: urls
props.description: URLs to extract content from (1-10 URLs per request).

props.name: response_length
props.description: Controls the length of content returned per result.

props.name: max_price_dollars
props.description: Maximum cost limit in dollars for the entire request.

props.name: extract_effort
props.description: Processing effort level.

props.name: screenshot
props.description: Capture page screenshots. Results will include a screenshot_url field.

props.name: enable_summary
props.description: Enable AI-powered processing of the content.

props.name: summaryOptions
props.description: Custom instructions for AI summarization (up to 500 characters).

props.name: custom_summary_instructions
props.description: Custom instructions for AI summarization (up to 500 characters).

props.name: json_schema

list_datasources.description: List all available datasources with metadata, schemas, and pricing. Useful for discovering available data sources.

props.name: category
props.description: Filter datasources by category.

search.description: Search the web, research papers, and proprietary datasets to retrieve relevant context.

props.name: query
props.description: The search query to find relevant content.

props.name: max_num_results
props.description: Maximum number of results to return (1-20 for standard API keys, up to 100 with special API key).

props.name: search_type
props.description: Type of search to perform. 'web' searches web content. 'proprietary' uses Valyu's full-text multimodal indices. 'news' returns only news articles.

props.name: fast_mode
props.description: Enable fast mode for reduced latency but shorter results. Best for general purpose queries.

props.name: max_price
props.description: Maximum price in dollars for a thousand retrievals (CPM). Only applies when provided.

props.name: relevance_threshold
props.description: Minimum relevance score for results (0.0-1.0).

props.name: included_sources
props.description: Specific sources to search (URLs, domains or dataset names).

props.name: excluded_sources
props.description: Specific sources to exclude from search (URLs, domains, or dataset names).

props.name: category
props.description: Natural language category/guide phrase to help guide the search (e.g., "agentic use-cases").

props.name: response_length
props.description: Controls the length of content returned per result.

props.name: country_code
props.description: 2-letter ISO country code to bias search results (e.g., US, GB, DE).

props.name: start_date
props.description: Start date for time-filtered searches (YYYY-MM-DD).

props.name: end_date
props.description: End date for time-filtered searches (YYYY-MM-DD).

props.name: url_only
props.description: When set to true, only returns URLs for results (no content). Only applies when search_type is web or news.
